name: Monstermörten
description:
Go fishing in the middle of the night!

Watch out for the monstermört.

Watch out for the Norwegians! And bears. And aerials!

How to play:

Catch 10 fishes!

Click to drill, seat yourself, and also fish.

Click the E to put the lantern down.

Credits

Lukas Rabhi Hallner

Pontus Andersson

Simon Gustavsson

Carl Appelkvist

Fredrik Lind
